task.title: Program Terms
task.abstract: Program Terms tracks the term type: Candidate, Maintenance or Lifetime, and amount of time to complete the related goals.

context.p: Candidate Term is the amount of time that a participant has to successfully complete a program. The duration (months) is set on the Program record. A new Candidate term can be created for a candidtate who is new to a program, was unsuccessful in a previous attempt or has lapsed (maintenance term expired).

Maintenance Term is the amount of time to complete maintenance requirements or renew term expires. The initial maintenance term is generated by a staff user after all the candidate term has been successfully completed.
Lifetime Term is generated if there is no maintenance associated with a program. Once the initial requirements are successfully completed, the program profile neither expires nor needs to be renewed.
